short_summary: Shared Services Canada has a requirement for Apple MacBooks with AppleCare for Enterprise or equivalent
description: NOTICES. NPP Solicitation : 2BH3154862/ADepartment : Shared Services CanadaNotification Period: 27 days (21/12/2023 to 16/01/2024) Description of Requirement: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.Bids must be submitted only to the P2P portal for RFQ Submission by the date, time and place indicated on page 1 of the RFQ.
full_summary:
#### Shared Services Canada – Apple MacBooks with AppleCare Procurement

Shared Services Canada is soliciting a proposal for the procurement of Apple products with AppleCare for Enterprise or equivalent for 82 users.

** Tender Details **

| Category | Name | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | SSC-23-00024951-T/3 | Solicitation call reference number |
| Title (English) | SSC Apple MacBooks with AppleCare for Enterprise or equivalent for Shared Services Canada | Tender title |
| Title (French) | SSC Apple MacBooks avec AppleCare pour entreprise ou équivalent pour Services partagés Canada | Tender title in French |
| Procurement Category | Goods and Services (GD) | Category of services/procedure of awarding the contract |
| Procurement Method | Competitive Bidding | Method of procuring the contract |
| Trade Agreements | Various trade agreements | List of free trade agreements available |

** General Details **

* The proposed procurement includes:
	+ 47 Apple 15-inch MacBook Airs with AppleCare for Enterprise or equivalent
	+ 23 Apple 13-inch MacBook Airs with AppleCare for Enterprise or equivalent
	+ 12 Apple 16-inch MacBook Pros with AppleCare for Enterprise or equivalent
* The products will be delivered in Ottawa, ON
* The contract is expected to be awarded within 30 working days of the contract award date
* Bids must be submitted through the PeopleSoft Supplier portal
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French
* Contact information: Michael Boualavong, Procurement Officer, (613) 402-8895, [michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

** Important Dates **

* Tender Opening Date: January 11, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: January 16, 2024, 2:00 PM
* Expected Contract Start Date: After contract award
* Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

[Procurement documents for the bid can be found here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/0000-{id}). Please navigate to the designated procurement portal for information on submission and helpful guides for suppliers. 

Please refer to the above content to create your company's submission for the Shared Services Canada – Apple MacBooks with AppleCare for Enterprise or equivalent for Shared Services Canada. Good
